name: Axe Throw: Hit and Champ!
description:
Have you ever wondered how the life of lumberjack looks from the inside? Our new simulator gives you a chance to watch it and, moreover, become a lumberjack yourself in a virtual world. If you see a wooden log just flip axe in your hand, throw it and champ the log! Throw your knife into wooden planks and hit them, show your champ with your axe every tree or log, which you can see on your way. There may be many wooden items on your way, but what could be more pleasant, than throwing the axe or knives into it. So if you can see a wooden log or planks, just flip axe in your hand and champ the wooden “victim”! As always, you can find many interesting knives and axes in our in-game store, which will add a few astonishing effects to your flipping axe throw. Show everybody true power of lumberjack’s flipping champ in our new helix simulator: Axe Throw: Hit and Champ.

In our new helix simulator, you will play as the lumberjack. If you see anything wooden on your way, just flip axe in your hand and champ the wood! Hit the wood with the helix of knives, throw your knife into logs or planks and hit them, champ them after flipping axe, it is up to your choice. For every broken wooden log, you will earn points and tokens, which you can spend in our in-game store. Hit trees with the helix of knives or helix of axes to earn more tokens! Buy a new axe or knife to hit more and faster. New items also will add some effects, so your work will not only be productive but will also have amazing effects. So, throw your knife into planks, champ logs with your flipping axe and hit them with the helix of knives to earn as many points as possible. Beat every score on the leaderboard and become the best lumberjack in this helix simulator, but if you cannot do it, you can champ the leaderboard as it is wooden too (but we are not sure whether should you do it or not).

Axe Throw: Hit and Champ is a free to play simulator of the lumberjack. Champ every wooden thing on your way by flipping your axe, throw your knife into planks, hit them with the helix of knives and show everyone who the best lumberjack in this axe flip simulator is. Buy new axes and knives in our store, which will raise your productivity and will add awesome effects. Share this axe flip simulator with your friends and compete in flipping axes, find out who will champ more wooden logs. Just throw your knife into a log or champ it with your flipping axe to earn points and raise your position in the leaderboard. Download our helix simulator and show everyone how powerful your flipping axe is. Will you become the best lumberjack? Try your best in our new game and find out.
